item.title: Things you can do with windows sound recorder
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

[quote=“bumr055, post:4, topic:1986”]you can also record songs and play them backwords and find secrets!:
-hit me baby one more time
-stairway to heaven
-dinner at deviants palace
-hell awaits
thats all i can think of off my head theres ALOT tho! and there defenitly is alot better prorams to do that with.[/quote]

Can u give an example of led zeppelin singin something secret (in stairway?)

item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Ebaums stole that lol. They steal so much. That windows thing has been on new grounds for the longest time.

That guy who made that, is so sick with that music recorder stuff. Sounded pretty nice, and I think you can actually download that song from his site. Anyways...

Check this out. -Ebaums sucks.

The guy who really made it, was this guy. Link. His real site is www.clownstaples.tk if you wanna visit.

~Ron
